entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023
